title.rendered: I decided to learn digital marketing to shift from the BPO sector to be part of the growing digital marketing industry. – Kambhatla Ajay Kumar

content.rendered:
Digital marketing is one of the booming sectors of India. And, it’s well understood by the marketers as well as other working professionals; and those who are looking for the change in jobs or want to enhance their current skills. Reasons can be many, but the solution seems to be only one i.e. Digital Marketing. In the same manner, one of our Digiperformers from Vizag (Vishakhapatnam), Kambhatla Ajay Kumar, who was working in BPO; got fed with tiresome working operations and started looking for opportunities where he could learn more. During his research period, he discussed the same situation or concerns with many of his dear ones and asked for guidance. Having expertise in the marketing field as well, he decided to explore his skills in digital marketing and started to learn the same through reputed training company. Then, he came to know about Digiperform and joined our dCDMC which is an advanced level digital marketing course. Later, just after the completion of the course, he joined as a Seo Analyst in one of the reputed digital marketing agency of Vizag.    During our Vizag visit, we decided to ask what exactly motivated him to switch his industry and how Digiperform helped him in the process.

Here we go! Digiperform: It’s a pleasure to connect with you! Before heading further, we would like to know a bit about you.

Ajay: Hi I am Ajay from Vizag. I am graduate and been working in the BPO sector for quite long. Along with that, I also have marketing experience as well.

Recently, I have completed my advanced level digital marketing – dCDMC certification from Digiperform. Currently, I am working in web designing and marketing company – Webixion Technologies as an SEO Analyst. Digiperform: What originally attracted you to choose digital marketing as your career?

  Ajay: Honestly, I wanted to change my job profile from the BPO sector to something interesting and growing. As I already have had experience in the marketing sector, I decided to explore the marketing path and enhance my skills as per the current trends. After discussing with my dear ones and seeking some guidance from marketing professionals, I came to the conclusion that digital marketing is booming in the current scenario. And if you want to stay up in your career as an ideal career oriented fellow, you must go with the trend to grab the abundance of opportunities.

Digiperform: What exactly that makes us stand out from the competition & urge you to choose us over others?

  Ajay: I have attended online demo classes of many digital marketing institutes but realized I can learn digital marketing with live class sessions only. On searching for offline classes, I find out Digiperform is the only training institute in Vizag that provide complete digital marketing training in the live classroom. After taking few classes, I realized trainers and management of the Digiperform are highly experienced and professional. They are the perfect career mentors. Plus, they provide LMS which has all the set of digital marketing modules with practical assignments that help you to learn and revise your pieces of training any time from anywhere.  

Digiperform: Tell us about your favorite experience you had with us, whether as a learner or as a customer?

  Ajay: I would like to appreciate the dedication of our trainers. They had taught us each concept fully along with practical examples. Also, they gave us backup classes if we missed out anything or wanted to clear doubts again. That’s the best part I felt as a learner.

Digiperform: Would you consider Digiperform as a trusted & reliable resource for Digital marketing training? Why?

Ajay: Yes, I would definitely recommend Digieprform to others as the trusted resource for digital marketing training.

Digiperform: If you were to review our training program, what score would you give it out of 10?

  Ajay: I would give 8 out of 10.  

Digiperform: Where do you see yourself in the next 5 years?

  Ajay: Though I am working as an SEO Analyst, I would like to see myself to master in all aspects of digital marketing and be a Digital Marketing Manager of a reputed company one day, for sure.  

Digiperform: If you had a piece of advice to someone just starting out, what would it be?

  Ajay: Please gain complete knowledge of all the topics in Digital Marketing and ask for doubts frankly if you have any. Practice as much as you can. Just don’t stick to thorough readings.  

Digiperform: Finally, Describe Digiperform in one line.

  Ajay: Digiperform is –  Digital Marketing Institute With Best Standards. Thanks, Ajay, for sharing your valuable input and being the part of Digiperform family. We wish you a great luck for your future endeavors.
